title: After court, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard's careers face another trial
description: After six weeks of testimony in a defamation trial that has aired the good, bad and the very ugly of Johnny Depp and Amber Heard's former relationship, the case is now in the hands of the jury.

title: The 'Big Lie' wasn't all that Georgia Republicans rejected last week
description: Georgia Republicans last week rejected two malignant trends within their party -- one less conspicuous, but no less important, than the other.

title: No word from Ukraine's missing Azovstal defenders, say some families
description: Two weeks ago, hundreds of Ukrainian fighters ended their defense of the Azovstal steel plant. Now, some of their loved ones say they still have heard little or no information on their whereabouts.

title: Devastating rain kills dozens in northeast Brazil
description: At least 56 people have died in Brazil's northeastern state of Pernambuco amid heavy rains over the weekend, according to the state's civil defense forces.

title: GOP lawmaker says he's 'open' to AR-15 ban
President Zelensky on conditions to talk to Putin directly
description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky tells CNN's Fareed Zakaria how much territory Ukraine would be willing to cede to Russia and what he thinks Russian President Vladimir Putin does not realize about the situation on the ground.

title: Jacy Nittolo remembers 'deep love' with fiancé Ray Liotta
description: Ray Liotta's fiancée, Jacy Nittolo, penned an emotional tribute to the late actor days after his death in the Dominican Republic.

title: Summer not your favorite time of the year? You're not alone
description: Yes, the summer begins now. It's not me saying so. It's the American people. Survey after survey has found that more Americans believe Memorial Day marks the unofficial start of summer than any other occasion (e.g., the beginning of baseball season or when pools open).

title: Where to go this summer: 11 top destinations
description: It's looking like this summer will be a travel season to remember, especially following the Covid-stricken summers of 2020 and 2021.

title: Police inaction in Texas school shooting had catastrophic consequences, experts say
North Korea claims Covid outbreak improving, may rethink curbs
description: North Korea says its Covid-19 outbreak is improving and it is considering revising its anti-epidemic regulations.

title: Disaster upon disaster: Wildfires are contaminating the West's depleting water with ashy sludge
description: Officials in Las Vegas, New Mexico, had barely finished battling the massive Calf Canyon-Hermits Peak wildfire earlier this month before they had to point their defenses toward another threat: the ash-filled erosion that could pollute their water.

title: Flying 'Dragon of Death' is the largest pterosaur discovered in South America
description: Fossils from a flying "Dragon of Death" have been discovered in Argentina, new research revealed.

title: US 'troubled' as UN rights chief urges China to review counter-terrorism policies
description: UN human rights chief Michelle Bachelet, whose rare visit to China was criticized by rights groups and Western countries, said she urged Beijing to review its counter-terrorism policies to ensure they comply with international human rights standards.

title: Real Madrid beats Liverpool to win Champions League title on a night marred by security issues
description: Real Madrid is simply made for nights like these.
